column2: Oh, the way you crushed Mike at ping pong was such\n  a turn-on.You wanna...? (plays with her finger on Chandlers chest)'
You know, I'd love to, but I'm a little tired."
I'll put a pillowcase over my head."
You're on!"
Hey!'
What's up?"
Well, okay, Mike's taking a shower, which by the\n  way there's  no law against. And then we're gonna grab some food, so if you\n  want..."
... finally...'
Is that Ross?'
Yeah, you can hear everything through these stupid\n  walls.'
Sounds like he's with someone."
He could be alone. This morning I heard him do\n  push-ups, and then talk to his triceps.'
Wait a minute, I think Phoebe's right. You know I\n  hear someone else in there with him."
Ooh... Dr. Geller!'
God, you're amazing... I didn't even have to ask you\n  to call me that."
Oh my God, that's Charlie!"
She's cheating on Joey with Ross!"
Oh that tart... floozy... giant...'
I'm not sure about this."
Yeah, you're right. This is none of our business."
No I'm not sure that it's  the best way to hear\n  everything. Someone get me a glass!"
Oh, I'm not gonna do this, okay? I'm not gonna eavesdrop\n  on my friend."
(through wall) Ooh... I love Barbados!  '
Ooh... I can't believe I'm kissing you. I'm\n    kissing Rachel!"
I know, I'm her!"
(whispering) Rachel and Joey! It's Rachel and Joey!!!"
What?'
Get over here!'
ooh...'
Wow!'
(in her Monica-excited-way... TOO LOUD!) Oh my God,\n  I love how thin these walls are!'
(muffled) Thank you.'
Hey, you know, before you said\n    that nothing could happen between us? What changed?'
Well, I only said that because of Ross, you know. Then\n  I saw him kissing Charlie...'
What? Ross and Charlie? (Joey nods) Wow! She's really\n  making her way through the group, huh? Ah, who am I to talk?"
I can't believe this. Rachel and Joey?"
How about the dinosaur twins in the other room?\n  No-one is manning that wall!'
I'm on it!"
Anything?'
I think I hear curtains closing... '
We've got shoes being kicked off over here."
Bedsprings, unmistakable!'
You do realise  that's your brother?"

Not until you said it. Somebody switch! (Chandler
  makes a clicking sound with his fingers and Phoebe runs to the other wall.
  Monica returns to Chandlers wall.) Wait a minute... Ross and Charlie, Joey
  and Rachel, Phoebe and Mike! We're the only people  leaving with the
  same person we came with."
That's not true. I came with Monica and I'm leaving\n  with Weird Al."
Okay, I've had it with the hair jokes. Tomorrow morning,\n  before we leave, I'm going to the salon."
Okay Buckwheat!'
You gotta hear this, it's great... It's like free\n  porn! (Chandler eagerly rushes over)"
Weh...*sigh*'
uhm... Is everything okay?'
Yeah, It's just... I don't think I can do this..."
Ooh... Is it because of what might be on the bedspread,\n  because I saw that news report too, with the infra red and the ... I could\n  just...'

No, NO! (they're moving to the side of the bed, where\n  they sit down) Look, I need to talk to Joey. I mean, you guys just broke up.\n  Before anything more happens between us, I need to know he's okay with it."
I uhm... I completely understand.'

Alright, I'm gonna go find them... (twitches a bit,
  looks down) I just need a... need a before I can... you know. (gestures standing
  up... they sit and wait for a while) Grandma... grandma... grandma... (he tries
  to concentrate...) Okay, I see you later."
Okay...'
That's the door. He's gone..."
And she's... turning on the TV... and watching...\n  Miss Congeniality!"
Honey, if you know it through a wall, you know it\n  too well!'
Hey, what are you guys doing?'
Oh, we're just... we're sad to go so we're just saying\n  goodbye to the hotel. (hugs the wall) I love you... Paradise Hotel, Golf resort\n  and Spa... (she walks away from the wall)"
(also hugs the wall) Yeah, we had a great time, thank\n  you! (walks to Phoebe)'
(caresses the wall with his finger) Bye!'
Okay, uhm... Hey, you guys seen Joey anywhere?'
He's probably in his room with his current girlfriend\n  Charlie. That's the situation as we know it... (walks to Phoebe and Monica)"
Well, if you see him could you please tell\n  him I'm looking for him?"
You got it!'
Thanks! (walks out of the room and starts hugging the\n  wall) Thank you! (closes the door)'
Other wall, people! Other wall!'
(knocks on door) Rach,  you there? (Joey and Rachel\n  both get up from the bed)'
Oh my God, it's Ross. What are we gonna do?"

Oh, ju-ju-just stay calm. Just be calm. For all he
  knows we're just hanging out together. Right? Just be nonchalant. (Joey like
  stands at attention with his chest forward and his hands on his sides, looking
  up at the ceiling with his lips pouted.) That's not nonchalant!"
No idea what it means.'
Oh... okay, just hide!'
(knocks) Rach?'
Coming! Try under the bed, try under the bed!'
There's no room under the bed. (looks around because\n  she can't find Joey anymore)"
Is everything okay?'
Yeah... (still looking to see where Joey went, and\n  opens the door)'
Hey.'
You know where Joey is?'
...I really don't... (looks around again)"
Can I talk to you for a minute?'
Yeah, sure... (looks outside into the corridor if\n  Joey is there)'
I don't believe this... Have you guys been..."
Shhh... This is the listening side of the\n  wall.'
And then she told me that she and Joey had broken up,\n  and that part of the reason was that she had feelings for me.'
(clearly not listening and still trying to find out\n  where Joey went) Uh-huh... right... yeah...'
And you know I wanted to ask Charlie out since the\n  day I met her.'
(still searching) Oh, I know... I know it's been\n  really hard for you."
Anyway, one thing lead to another, and... oh... before\n  you know it, we were kissing. I mean, how angry do you think Joey is gonna\n  be?'
(now looking up at the ceiling) That is hard to say,\n  Ross. That is hard to say.'
You know, I gotta go find him. He's gotta be here someplace."
You would think!'
Joey!'
Is he gone?'
(still can't find him) How are you doing this?"
Pssst...'
How... wha... Hey! What are you... What is this?\n  Have you guys been listening this entire time?'
YE-AH!'
Now, what is this?'
Ah, what is this? Well, lets see, we kissed for ten\n  minutes and now we're talking to our friends about it, so I guess this is sixth\n  grade!"
Oh no... Have you thought about it how complicated\n  this could get? What about Ross?'
Well, he's with Charlie now."
Yeah, but he wants to talk to you before anything\n  really happens with her. And as his friend, I mean, don't you think\n  he deserves the same from you?"
(long pause and he twitches a bit) You're a pain in\n  my ass, Geller!"
All right, look you guys... Look, we appreciate all\n  the advice, but this is between Joey and me and I think we can handle it...'
Okay, well we'll go back in there, but will you\n  do one thing for us? The people that  care about you?"
Sure...'
Enunciate!'
Get out!'
Are they right?'
Probably, yeah... I mean, maybe we should... hold off\n  until we talk to Ross.'
Yeah... Yeah, we can wait, we don't have\n  to do anything tonight."
Yeah, I think that'd be best... So, so I'm gonna...\n  I'm gonna take off..."
(Joey walks to the door) Although... '
(turns around very fast) I like although!'
I mean, you know... Ross and I haven't dated in like...\n  six years..."
Six years? Wow... It's almost as long as highschool..."
Plus, you know, he is with Charlie now.'
Absolutely! He's not thinking about you."
I'm thinking about you..."
Yeah...'
Let's forget about Ross..."
Forgotten.'
What's wrong?"
Nothing...'

column1: Joey's voice, but she sees Ross
column2: Seriously... What is it?"
Nothing... It's really... It's nothing... Come here,\n  come here..."
What's wrong?"
Sorry, I just uhm... I can't seem to get Ross out\n  of my head..."
Well, maybe I can help. (he grabs her head passionately,\n  closes his eyes and kisses... Ross in Rachel's dress! He realises it too late,\n  and when he does, pushes Ross's/Rachel's head away)"
Ooh, your lips are so soft... Do\n  that again... (and she/he moves in for another kiss. Joey, pushes her head\n  away again...)'
Yeah... we really need to talk to Ross...'
Yeah'
Hey!'
Hey!'
You guys ready to go?'
Not quite. Monica's still at the salon, and I'm\n  just finishing packing."
Dude! You're not taking your Bible?"
You're not supposed to take that. Besides, it's\n  a New Testament, what are you gonna do with it?"
Learn about Jesus...'
Hey!'
So, did you talk to Joey?'
Uh, no... no. I couldn't find him. I'm just gonna talk\n  to him on the plane."
Yeah, sounds like a good idea... Dr. Geller!'
Stop it!'
PHD'
You're filthy!"
Hey, have you guys seen Monica?'
Uh, actually I think she went to the salon.'
Oh yeah, oh, she went to the salon alright...'
Check it out!'
Who's day just got better? CHANDLER!"
Hey!... aaaaaahhhh!'
What do you think?'
I think.... I think I can see your scalp.'
Don't you just love it?"
Ye... Yeah... Yeah... You got shellfish in your head.'
It's so... something... You go girlfriend!"
You've never said that in your life, have you?"
Not once.'
I thought so.'
And listen to this... (shakes her body so the shells\n  tingle)'
What d'ya know... It's a treat for the eyes and the\n  ears."
Whoo, whoo. Wow, it's uhm... kinda weird that I'm sitting\n  next to Charlie after we broke up."
Yeah, it's almost if Air Barbados doesn't care\n  about your social life."
Look, does someone mind switching to sit with Charlie?'
Oh, I uh, I mean, I... dude, I spent the whole conference\n  with Charlie.'
I understand...'
No, I'll do it. (he quickly grabs Joey's boarding pass\n  and gives Joey his one.)"
Wish I could switch with someone. I really don't\n  wanna sit with Allen Iverson over there."
Uhm... You know, once we're in the air and the captain\n  turns off the seatbelt sign... you feel free to roam about my cabin..."
You should be careful when checking your overhead bins,\n  'cause items may shift during..."
Aaah... you're not good at this..."
You don't have to go home tonight, do you?"
No, I think I can come over. It's Saturday, right?"
What?'
Uhm... I can't do anything tonight."
Why not?'
I have a date.'
You have a... You have a date? With who?'
Oh, it's... my girlfriend."
(lets go of his hand) You have...  have a girlfriend?'
Yeah... Well, when... you and I broke up I started\n  seeing someone.'
For how long?'
Three months.'
Three months? Okay... This is probably none of my\n  business, but uhm, how long do you think you're gonna keep seeing her?"
I'll tell her that it's over tonight at dinner. I\n  promise."
Oh, okay... good. You do that. And then when you\n  get home, maybe there'll be a special delivery package waiting for you."
Maybe I'll sign for it. Tear it open. Pull out the\n  packing material..."
You know what, we're gonna have sex. Let's just leave\n  it there."
Right, I\'m gonna go talk to Joey. I think this is the\n  right time. He\'s always in a good mood after the flight attendant says "duty\n  free".'
Okay... Good luck.'
Ross is coming over. I think now would be a really\n  good time to talk to him.'
I guess so. I'm just... really nervous."
Okay, well keep in mind that by the time you're done,\n  they'll probably be serving dinner."
Ooh...'
Still nervous?'
I'm gonna get the lasagna."
Hey Rach...'
Yeah!'
Do you mind if I sit here for a sec.?'
Yeah, yeah sure! Yeah! (mouths "Good luck" to\n  Joey and gets up from her seat)'
Hey!'
Hey!'
So, I uhm... kinda need to talk to you about Charlie.'
Yeah?'
Okay, last night after you guys broke up... so sorry\n  to hear about that, by the way... Well, Charlie and I were talking, and...,\n  well...'
You kissed.'
Wha... (gasps) What? What would give you that idea?'
I saw you.'
Yeah, we kissed, but... nothing else... nothing else\n  happened, okay.'
Ross, Ross, Ross... It's okay."
What?'
It's okay. You know, I totally understand,\n  alright? You guys, make way more sense than her and I ever did, you know. And...\n  I want you to be happy."
Are you serious?'
Yeah... Now I have something...'
I am speachless... I mean the fact that you would put\n  my happiness first like that. I mean, you're an incredible friend, you know\n  that?"
Oh... uh...  look... before you...'
No, I mean it. You are so loyal man, and selfless,\n  and generous...'
I am those things, yeah.'
You know what? I know Chandler longer, so I always\n  think of him as my best friend, but now... I may have to rethink some\n  stuff...'
Dude!'
Hey, if there is ever, anything I can do for you...'
I can't think of anything."
Thanks!'
Yeah.'
So hi!'
Hi!'
So you eh, you talked to Joey?'
Ah, yeah. We had a really good talk.'
Oh! That's great!"
Yeah!'
Oh, so everything's okay?"
Oh, no, it's great. It's great. He is... He is an amazing\n  guy."
Ah... Well, obviously I think so too.'
Well, I'm so excited about this."
Really? Excited?'
Are you kidding? I have had some very dirty dreams\n  about this...'
Excuse me! (and she walks back to Joey, who is still\n  looking very impressed about what Ross said to him. Rachel looks at him and\n  hits him.) You didn't tell him, did you?"
I couldn't. He was saying all these really nice things\n  about me. I didn't want him to get mad and take 'em all back. I'm on a edge\n  on Chandler."
Oh God! Alright, fine. You know what Joey, forget\n  it. When we go back to New York, I will tell him.'
Thank you. Yeah, I appreciate that.'
Hi, Mike's place."
Hey, it's Mike."
Ooh, that was fast.'
Oh, err... no, she's not here yet. You know, I think\n  I'm just gonna take off and break up with her over the phone..."

Yeah, you can't do that! Oh, come on Mike, strap
  on a pair.Why don't you just tell her that we got back together. You know,
  women appreciate honesty. We also appreciate gentle spanking once in a while.
  Just F.Y.I."
One more thing... There... might be a picture of Precious\n  on my coffee table.'
Her name is Precious? Is she a purebreed or did you\n  pick her up at the pound?'
Anyway, I just wanna give you a heads up. '
Okay, oh and you know, if she gets upset, just scratch\n  her tummy and give her a liver snout. (laughs and hangs up the phone)'
Hi, I'm Precious, who are you?"
(stunned) I... I'm Phoebe."
Phoebe? Mike's ex-girlfriend Phoebe, the love of\n  his life? That Phoebe?"
Enchant\xc3\xa9 (she holds out her hand, and they shake\n  hands)'
Oh, I can't wait for everyone at work to see these...\n  (plays with her hair to make the shells tingle again) Ow!"
You go back to work tomorrow night, right?'
Yeah!'
So if you want people to see them, then by definition\n  you're not  having them taken out... say, at the break of dawn?"

Well, if I had them taken out, then I wouldn't be
  able to do this. (she pushes Chandler on the couch and brushes her
  hair and shells against Chandler's chest) You like that, right? (again, she
  brushes her hair against his chest and hums...)"
What are you singing?'
It\'s "Bolero" from "10".'
It\'s "Ride of the Valkyries" from "Apocalypse\n  Now"...\n  See, here\'s the thing
You what? You said you liked them.'
Did I? Let's refresh. I believe what I said was\n  that I could see your scalp."
Fine, so you don't like them. Everybody else does."
Again, let's journey back... As I recall what Rachel\n  said, was  she had never notice the shape of your skull before. And Joey...\n  Well, Joey didn't realise that there was anything different."
You know what? I don't care. I like it like this,\n  and I'm gonna keep it. You're just jealous because your hair can't do this...\n  (and she shakes her head more violently) OUCH!"
Hit yourself in the tooth?'
And the eye!'

(gasps) Hi... There she is. Hi Emma. Oh my God, I missed
  you. (kisses her) Oh Emma, I missed you so much. Hey... Did you have
  a good time with grandma Green? Huh? Did she give you a bottle of anti-depressants
  again to use as a rattle? (to Rachel)'
That was one time, Ross, and they were only like\n  5 milligrams.'
Ooh hey, Emma, daddy has some presents for you okay?\n  Okay? I want you to wait right here. Come here sweetie.'
Aaah... Ross, actually there's something that I really\n  need to talk to you about."
(unpacking his bag) Okay, shoot!'
Okay, uhm... alright, here's the deal."
(gasps) OH NO!'
What? What is it?'
Oh, major shampoo explosion!'
Uh, look Ross, this really isn't easy."
Oh, it's all over everything. Why?\n  Why me? (looks up)"
Because you took three hundred bottles of shampoo?'
I'm sorry, I'm sorry. You were saying?"
Well, yeah... Okay, look it's about me and..."
Oh, not another one! Oh my G... And this is moisturiser.\n  It's even harder to clean! Why? Why do bad things happen to good people?"
Wow! Well, clearly this is not a good time.'
Duh, you think? (enters the kitchen)'

Okay, bye. Alright, so Mike's on his way over. See,
  you thought you guys were meeting here, and he thought you were meeting at
  the restaurant, so you know... Doesn't really matter who's right or wrong.
  Point is... I'm gonna take off."
I'm not letting you leave until you tell me what's\n  going on here. I mean, are you guys getting back together or something?"
Alright... Susie, can I call you Susie?'
My name is Precious.'

Yeah, I can't say that. uhm... Susie, I'm gonna be
  straight with you... Mike and I are back together... and uhm... unfortunately
  that effectively ends your relationship with him. And he's very sorry about
  that and wishes you the best of luck in all your endeavours."
I just can't believe this... Why?"
Well, I don't..."
Oh, why would he do this? I mean, what's wrong\n  with me?"
Nothing, there's nothing wrong with you."
I mean, what the hell am I supposed to do now?'
Damn it woman, pull yourself together! Have\n    some pride, for the love of God.'
Okay, not a fan of the tough love.'
I just can't believe that Mike didn't give me any\n  warning."
But he didn't really know, you know. He wasn't planning\n  on coming to Barbados and proposing to me..."
He proposed to you? This is the worst birthday  ever.\n  (she starts to cry again)'

Look, Precious... Mike's not worth this.
  You're an attractive, intelligent woman and let's face it, Mike's kind of a
  wang. I mean, he proposed to me while he was still seeing you... He was gonna
  break-up with you on your birthday? And, I don't like to kiss-and-tell,
  but he cheated on you a lot this weekend."
Oh, my God, maybe you're right. Maybe I don't need\n  him. I deserve to be treated with respect."
Screw you, Mike. You're a coward and a bastard,\n  and I hope you rot in hell. "
You're welcome!"
Honey, you've been in there for a long time...\n  Is everything okay?"
Not really. '
I have a problem.'
Really? What happened?'
Well, I was dancing around, and singing "No Woman,\n  No Cry" and I got stuck.'
You can't move at all?"
Oh, well, I can move... (she moves back and forth\n  the shower curtain rail, opening and closing the shower curtain with her hair\n  as she goes)'
If I untangle you, will you please get rid of the\ncorn rose?'
(looking disappointed) I guess so...'
(trying to untangle her) Some of these look a little\n  frayed.'
Yeah, I tried to gnaw myself free.'
Hey!'
Hi!'
So, did you err... did you tell Ross?'
Well, I tried, but then he had a shampoo related\n  emergency. So I guess now it's your turn again."

No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no... I think it's better
  if you tell him, you know. It's easier for a woman. That way, you know, if
  he gets mad, all you have to do is go... I didn't mean it. I'm so so--ooory. (he
  pushes  his breasts together from the side)"
Yeah, 'cause that's what we do."
Alright, alright, okay, uhm... How 'bout this, how\n  about this? Tomorrow... tomorrow we'll both go and we'll tell him together."
Okay, that sounds fair. It just means that once again\n  we can't..."
I know, I know..., but that's okay. I mean, we can\n  control ourselves, we're not animals."
No! Of course we can wait. Alright, so I guess that\n  means good night then?'
Yeah! Good night! (they give each other a small kiss\n  on the mouth, and stare at each other for a while)'
Goo--ood night!'
Good night! (they give each other a kiss again, but\n  this time it lasts longer)'
Seriously, good night!'
Stop saying good night.'
Okay.'
Look what I found in the drawer... (Chandler looks\n  up from his book.) And you said I'd never wear this..."
Now that I untangled you, how 'bout you doing a\n  little something for me?"
Sure, what do you have in mind?'
I think you know.'
Really? I don't really feel like it."
This is what I want to do.'
Okay, I just don't get why you like it so much."
(Picks up the "Miss Congeniality" DVD) She\'s an\n  FBI agent, posing as a beauty contestant.'
